name: Altra_'Rade'_Retro_Entertainment_Media_Stand
reviews: cute and a really good value for the money

I didn't have many expectations for this product at this price, so I wasn't disappointed. It is just very average in every respect. There were a lot of screws to get it together, and the pieces didn't exactly fit all-that well, but it is together and in use for the purpose for which it was intended. The bottom shelf was too low to the ground, so I left it off.

I liked the item but it is smaller than you might think. The package I received hay the screws loose in the box and there were three screws missing. A bit of a hassle as I had to go out and buy screws but overstock did apologize and gave me a partial credit. Their customer service was very helpful and easy to work with. I would recommend this item.
description: This mod media stand with sleek hairpin legs and retro style mightput you in the mood to spin some vinyl. It has four spaciousstorage shelves designed for the latest components and music.Crafted in sturdy metal and quality engineered wood.
